component.description: DataTable is an enhanced version of the standard Datatable that provides built-in solutions to many commons use cases like paging, sorting, selection, lazy loading, filtering and more.
component.attributes:
&data_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
paginator false java.lang.Boolean false Enables pagination. Default is false. true
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String Template of the paginator. true
rowsPerPageTemplate false java.lang.String Template of the rowsPerPage dropdown. true
rowsPerPageLabel false java.lang.String Label for rowsPerPage dropdown. true
currentPageReportTemplate false java.lang.String Template of the currentPageReport UI. true
pageLinks false java.lang.Integer 10 Maximum number of page links to display. Default is 10. true
paginatorPosition false java.lang.String both Position of the paginator. Default is both. true
paginatorAlwaysVisible false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if paginator should be hidden if total data count is less than number of rows per page. Default is true. true
scrollable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes data scrollable with fixed header. Default is false.
scrollHeight false java.lang.String Height for scrollable data.
scrollWidth false java.lang.String Width for scrollable data.
selectionMode false java.lang.String Enables data selection, valid values are "single" and "multiple".
selection false java.lang.Object Reference to the selection data.
rowIndexVar false java.lang.String true Name of iterator to refer each row index.
emptyMessage false java.lang.String No records found. Text to display when there is no data to display. Default is "No records found."
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
liveScroll false java.lang.Boolean false Enables live scrolling. Default is false.
rowStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each row.
onExpandStart false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute before row expansion.
resizableColumns false java.lang.Boolean false Decides whether datatable columns are resizable or not.
sortBy false java.lang.Object Property to be used for default sorting.
sortOrder false java.lang.String ascending Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending"
sortFunction false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Integer sort(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object) Custom pluggable sortFunction for default sorting.
scrollRows false java.lang.Integer 0
rowKey false java.lang.Object Unique identifier of row data.
filterEvent false java.lang.String Client side event to invoke datatable filtering for input fields. Default is keyup.
filterDelay false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each filter query. Default is 300.
tableStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the table element.
tableStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the table element.
draggableColumns false java.lang.Boolean false Decides whether datatable columns can be reordered using dragdrop.
editable false java.lang.Boolean false Controls incell editing.
lazy false java.lang.Boolean Defines if lazy loading is enabled for the data component. true
filteredValue false java.util.List List to keep the filtered data if filtering is enabled.
sortMode false java.lang.String single Defines sorting mode, valid values are "single" (default) and "multiple".
editMode false java.lang.String row Defines edit mode, valid values are "row" (default) and "cell".
editingRow false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if cell editors of row should be displayed as editable or not. Default is false meaning display mode.
cellSeparator false java.lang.String Separator text to use in output mode of editable cells with multiple components.
summary false java.lang.String Summary attribute for WCAG.
frozenRows false java.lang.Integer 0 Number of rows to freeze starting from the beginning.
dir false java.lang.String ltr Defines text direction, valid values are "ltr" (default) and "rtl".
liveResize false java.lang.Boolean false Columns are resized live in this mode without using a resize helper.
stickyHeader false java.lang.Boolean false Sticky header stays in window viewport during scrolling.
expandedRow false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if row should be rendered as expanded by default.
disabledSelection false java.lang.Boolean false Disables row selection when true.
rowSelectMode false java.lang.String new Defines row select mode for checkbox based selection, valid values are new (default), add and checkbox.
rowExpandMode false java.lang.String multiple Defines row expand mode, valid values are "single" and "multiple" (default).
dataLocale false java.lang.Object Locale to be used in features such as filtering and sorting, defaults to view locale.
nativeElements false java.lang.Boolean false In native mode, datatable uses native radio-checkbox elements for row selection instead of extended ones.
frozenColumns false java.lang.Integer 0 Number of columns to freeze, default is 0.
draggableRows false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, rows can be reordered using dragdrop.
caseSensitiveSort false java.lang.Boolean false Case sensitivity for sorting, insensitive by default.
skipChildren false java.lang.Boolean false Ignores processing of children during lifecycle, improves performance if table only has output components, default is false.
disabledTextSelection false java.lang.Boolean true Disables text selection on row click. Default is true.
sortField false java.lang.String Name of the field to pass lazy load method for sorting. If not specified, sortBy expression is used to extract the name.
initMode false java.lang.String load Defines when the datatable is initiated at client side, valid values are "load" (default) and "immediate".
nullSortOrder false java.lang.Integer 1 Defines where the null values are placed in ascending sort order. Default value is "1" meaning null values are placed at the end in ascending mode and at beginning in descending mode. Set to "-1" for the opposite behavior.
tabindex false java.lang.String Position of the element in the tabbing order.
reflow false java.lang.Boolean false Reflow mode is a responsive mode to display columns as stacked depending on screen size.
liveScrollBuffer false java.lang.Integer 0 Percentage height of the buffer between the bottom of the page and the scroll position to initiate the load for the new chunk. Value is defined in integer and default is 0.
rowHover false java.lang.Boolean false Adds hover effect to rows, default is false. Hover is always on when selection is enabled.
rowStatePreserved false java.lang.Boolean false Keeps state of its children on a per-row basis. Default is false. true
resizeMode false java.lang.String fit Defines the resize behavior, valid values are "fit" (default) and expand.
